text: Higher Learning is a 1995 American drama movie directed by John Singleton and starring Ice Cube, Laurence Fishburne, Tyra Banks, Jennifer Connelly, Kristy Swanson and Omar Epps. Its subjects include racial prejudice, crime and struggles with sexuality taking place at a fictional university. == Other websites == * Category:1995 crime drama movies Category:1995 LGBT movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by John Singleton
title: Higher Learning
